claim: Nelson Mandela was only acclaimed in South Africa.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Although critics on the right denounced him as a communist terrorist and those on the radical left deemed him too eager to negotiate and reconcile with apartheid 's supporters , he gained international acclaim for his activism .

claim: Nelson Mandela was only acclaimed in South Africa.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It was named in honor of former South African President Nelson Mandela , and hosted by South Africa 's most successful professional golfer Gary Player .

claim: Nelson Mandela was only acclaimed in South Africa.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Four months later , Nelson Mandela was released after 27 years in prison , and in 1994 became the first president of a new democratic South Africa .
